The investigator analyse 5500 male female child 5-18 year old suspect diagnose due allergic disease . In child nearly 3000 FeNO measurement , 65000 spirometry measurement , 22000 whole-body plethysmography measurement 48000 occlusion resistance measurement perform year 2005-2012 .
